Constructs an empty builder with the specified capacity.

Parameters:

StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder()
Constructs an empty marginal. It is equivalent to an empty set.

Method Detail

parfactors

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder parfactors(Parfactor first,
                                                 Parfactor... remaining)
Sets the distribution from this marginal to the specified parfactors.

At least one parfactor must be specified. Parfactor's order is not preserved.

Parameters:
first - The first (mandatory) parfactor
remaining - The remaining parfactors
Returns:
This builder with the specified parfactors.

parfactors

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder parfactors(java.util.Set<Parfactor> parfactors)
Sets the distribution from this marginal to the specified parfactors.

At least one parfactor must be specified, otherwise nothing is done. Parfactor's order is not preserved.

Parameters:
parfactors - The set of parfactors that define this marginal
Returns:
This builder with the specified parfactors.

parfactors

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder parfactors(Distribution distribution)
Sets the distribution from this marginal to the parfactors in the specified distribution.

At least one parfactor must be in the distribution, otherwise nothing is done. Parfactor's order is not preserved.

Parameters:
distribution - The distribution that define this marginal
Returns:
This builder with the specified parfactors.

add

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder add(Marginal marginal)
Adds parfactors from the specified marginal to this builder.

The random variable set to be preserved is set to be the same as the specified marginal.

Parameters:
marginal -
Returns:
This builder with parfactors from the specified marginal added.

add

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder add(Parfactor parfactor)
Adds the specified parfactor to builder's distribution and returns the modified builder.

Parameters:
parfactor - The parfactor to add.
Returns:
This builder with the specified parfactor added

preservable

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder preservable(RandomVariableSet rvSet)
Adds the specified random variable set to this builder and returns the modified builder.

Parameters:
rvSet - The random variable set to preserve (that is, the one that will not be eliminated)
Returns:
This builder with the specified random variable set added

replace

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder replace(Parfactor oldOne,
                                              Parfactor newOne)
Replaces the specified old parfactor with the specified new parfactor and returns the modified builder.

If the specified old parfactor does not exist, returns this builder unmodified.

Parameters:
oldOne - The parfactor to be replaced
newOne - The parfactor that replaces the old one
Returns:
This builder with the old parfactor replaced with the new one.

remove

public StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder remove(Parfactor removable)
Removes the specified parfactor from the set of parfactors in this builder. If the parfactor does not exist, returns this builder unmodified.

Parameters:
removable - The parfactor to remove
Returns:
This builder with the specified parfactor removed
